trans-unit.source: Represents a section, within a configuration file, that defines settings for the workflow run-time engine.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en inndeling i konfigurasjonsfilen, som definerer innstillinger for arbeidsflyten kjøretid databasemotoren.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] WorkflowRuntimeSection contains settings specified by a <`section`> of type WorkflowRuntimeSection in a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]WorkflowRuntimeSection inneholder innstillinger som er angitt av en `section`> av typen WorkflowRuntimeSection i en konfigurasjonsfil.

trans-unit.source: The settings specified in a WorkflowRuntimeSection are used to initialize the workflow run-time engine.
trans-unit.target: Innstillingene som er angitt i en WorkflowRuntimeSection brukes til å initialisere arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren.

trans-unit.source: Your application can call the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.%23ctor%28System.String%29?displayProperty=fullName> constructor to initialize the workflow run-time engine from the appropriately named section of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Applikasjonen kan bruke den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.%23ctor%28System.String%29?displayProperty=fullName>konstruktøren initialisere arbeidsflyten kjøretid engine fra riktig navn delen av konfigurasjonsfilen.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.%23ctor%28System.String%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If your application does not use configuration files, but you still want to initialize the workflow run-time engine from a WorkflowRuntimeSection you can configure a WorkflowRuntimeSection in your application and call the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.%23ctor%28System.Workflow.Runtime.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeSection%29?displayProperty=fullName> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Hvis programmet bruker ikke konfigurasjonsfiler, men du fremdeles vil starte arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren fra en WorkflowRuntimeSection kan du konfigurere en WorkflowRuntimeSection i program, og kall av <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.%23ctor%28System.Workflow.Runtime.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeSection%29?displayProperty=fullName>konstruktør.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.%23ctor%28System.Workflow.Runtime.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeSection%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, your application might store configuration parameters in a database or it might operate in a trusted environment where configuration files are not used
trans-unit.target: For eksempel programmet kan lagre parametere i en database, eller den kan brukes i et klarert miljø der konfigurasjonsfilene ikke er brukt

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeSection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeSection"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of common parameters used by services.
trans-unit.target: Henter samling av vanlige parametere som brukes av tjenester.

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters can contain, for example, a database connection string that might be shared by durable services.
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters kan inneholde, for eksempel en database-tilkoblingsstreng som kan deles av robust services.

trans-unit.source: The common parameters used by services.
trans-unit.target: De vanlige parameterne som brukes av tjenester.

trans-unit.source: The default is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en nullreferanse (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether performance counters are enabled.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om-ytelsestellere er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: Performance counters provide information on various workflow-related statistics, but they cause a performance penalty when the workflow run-time engine starts and when workflow instances are running.
trans-unit.target: Ytelsestellere gir informasjon om ulike arbeidsflyt-relaterte statistikk, men de forårsaker en innvirkning på ytelsen når arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren starter, og når arbeidsflytforekomster kjører.

trans-unit.source: The default value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if performance counters are enabled; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis-ytelsestellere er aktivert. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the workflow run-time engine.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på arbeidsflyt kjøretid motoren.

trans-unit.source: This property is used to set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes til å angi <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng.

trans-unit.source: The name of the workflow run-time engine.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på arbeidsflyt kjøretid motoren.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of services that are added to the workflow run-time engine when it is initialized.
trans-unit.target: Henter samlingen av tjenestene som er lagt til arbeidsflyten kjøretid engine når den er initialisert.

trans-unit.source: The services specified in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeServiceElementCollection> are initialized by the workflow run-time engine and added to its services when the appropriate <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> constructor is called.
trans-unit.target: Tjenestene som er angitt i den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeServiceElementCollection>er initialisert av arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren og legges til tjenestene når den riktige <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>konstruktøren kalles.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeServiceElementCollection>

trans-unit.source: Therefore the services specified in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeServiceElementCollection> must follow certain rules about the signatures of their constructors.
trans-unit.target: Derfor tjenestene som er angitt i den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeServiceElementCollection>må følge regler om signaturer av deres konstruktører.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeServiceElementCollection>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeServiceElement>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeServiceElement>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeServiceElement>

trans-unit.source: The services to be added to the workflow run-time engine.
trans-unit.target: Tjenestene som skal legges til arbeidsflyten kjøretid motoren.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether validation occurs on the creation of the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om validering forekommer ved oppretting av arbeidsflytforekomsten.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the workflow validation is executed every time <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.CreateWorkflow%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: Når denne egenskapen er satt til `true`, arbeidsflyt-valideringen utføres hver gang <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.CreateWorkflow%2A>kalles.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.CreateWorkflow%2A>

trans-unit.source: If validation errors are found, a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowValidationFailedException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det finnes valideringsfeilene, en <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowValidationFailedException>forårsakes.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowValidationFailedException>

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `false`, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.CreateWorkflow%2A> creates a workflow instance and skips validation.
trans-unit.target: Når denne egenskapen er satt til `false`, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.CreateWorkflow%2A>oppretter en arbeidsflytforekomst og hopper over valideringen.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.CreateWorkflow%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the host application must guarantee that the workflow is properly configured or the runtime error occurs.
trans-unit.target: Vertsprogrammet må i så fall garantere at arbeidsflyten er riktig konfigurert, eller kjøretidsfeil forekommer.

trans-unit.source: The default value for this property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien for denne egenskapen er `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if validation occurs on creation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis det oppstår validering på oppretting; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of workflow definitions that can be cached by the runtime.
trans-unit.target: Henter antall arbeidsflytdefinisjoner som bufres av kjøretiden.

trans-unit.source: The number of workflows.
trans-unit.target: Antall arbeidsprosesser.
